description: Access real-time bus arrival information and comprehensive route details for Hong Kong's KMB and Long Win Bus services. Query bus routes, stops, and estimated arrival times effortlessly to enhance user experience. Utilize bilingual support for both English and Traditional Chinese to cater to a wider audience.

configSchema.description: Configuration for KMB Bus MCP server

capabilities.name: get_next_bus
capabilities.description:
Get the next arrival time for a specified bus route at a stop.
    
    Args:
        route: The bus route number (e.g., "1A", "6", "960")
        stop_name: The name of the bus stop

capabilities.name: find_buses_to_destination
capabilities.description:
Find bus routes that go to a specified destination.
    
    Args:
        destination: The destination to search for (e.g., "Central", "Mong Kok", "Airport")

capabilities.name: get_route_stops_info
capabilities.description:
Get all stops along a specified bus route.
    
    Args:
        route: The bus route number (e.g., "1A", "6", "960")

capabilities.name: find_stop_by_name
capabilities.description:
Find bus stops matching a name or partial name.
    
    Args:
        stop_name: Full or partial name of the bus stop to search for

capabilities.name: get_all_routes_at_stop
capabilities.description:
Get all bus routes that pass through a specified bus stop.
    
    Args:
        stop_name: Name of the bus stop
